mapper.insert: insert into coupon (coupon_id, allocation, user_id, content, use_date, start_date, end_date, hash_id) values (#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{allocation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update coupon set allocation = #{allocation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_date = #{useDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hash_id = #{hashId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select coupon_id, allocation, user_id, content, use_date, start_date, end_date, hash_id from coupon
